Related repos

  • Accepts audio inputs for voice chat and analysis
  • Qwen3-Coder is open source, supports 256K+ token context windows, and is built for agentic coding and large-scale code generation
  • GitHub repository for Qwen3 language models
  • Code-specific language model for coding tasks
  • Generates talking videos of any length from audio
  • open-source large language models for chat, code, and multilingual tasks
  • Qwen2.5 language models in various sizes
  • multimodal AI model for real-time text, image, audio, and video chat
  • Text-to-speech engine for long-form audio
  • Run speech-to-text and translation with a Whisper-powered API that supports multiple engines and formats
